PIN.values: |The transformation hirarchy makes a Sphere out of many elements, wich move around the surface&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf; |

|VVelcome!&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;this patch takes the "halo" node to simulate depth and focussing. &cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;moving the mouse up and down will focus from front to back of the sphere.&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;a left click onto the render releases control on particles, so that they will fly away, which was programmed with C# within vvvv. enlarge this patch to see how to work with C# within vvvv.&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;don't show this patch on startup?&cr;&lf;delete args.txt in vvvv's root directory.&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;F1 for help.|
|Right click on the node to see its source.&cr;&lf;It is written in C# and can modified within and while vvvv is running. |
|As soon you are happy with the code hit CTRL-S to save the code. &cr;&lf;The node's behaviour will change accordingly...|
